name: Pokemon Dumb Version 1 and 2
description:
Welcome to the Dumb Region! a Pokemon region newly settled with all new Pokemon! go through a short and sweet story with 2 (or 3 if ur playing 2) gyms and Pokemon league. Attempt to complete your Pokemon with 80-120 Pokemon with new and returning Legendary Pokemon! have fun on your journey!.

After the Pokemon league many new things around the region will open up including new areas, Pokemon, and more!
